message: Just a general question. I do and I couldnt love with out a few apps like bitesms, 5 icon dock, iconoclasm. Etc. Is anyone the else like me

I know what u mean, only thing I misses is the inapp SMS from bitesms. But being a heavy iPhone user, jailbreaking isn't worth the severe battery drain, lagging OS, and sporadic crashes. The day to day experience is KEY for me
I've jailbroken my phone a couple of times, but have always switched back. I wasn't a fan of the instability or things not working the way I'd expected them to work.
I like the improved notifications I can use and the many other little changes that be installed.
Just found folder enhancer. Very useful you can have scrollable folders plus folders in folders
